sentences.sentence: All they will be pabulum of your life.
sentences.translation: 那些将会是你生命中的精神粮食。

sentences.sentence: We can all supply mental pabulum, Mr O madden burke said.
sentences.translation: “咱们都能提供精神食粮，”奥马登伯克先生说。

sentences.sentence: We can all supply mental pabulum, Mr O 'madden Burke said.
sentences.translation: “咱们都能提供精神食粮，”奥马登·伯克先生说。
